job.title: Biological Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongBiological Data ScientiststrongppFast growing biotech startup aims to accelerate drug development and transform personalized medicine with multifaceted human health and omics data in conjunction with innovative mass spectrometry technology We are a team of passionate scientists clinicians and engineers with expertise in various disciplines We work together in a highly collaborative environment committed to make innovations with scientific rigor We emphasize growth within the company and offer a flexible work environment with the opportunity to learn from toptier thinkers and expertsppbrppstrongRolestrongppThis position is within the data science team focusing on deriving insights from metabolomics genomics microbiome and clinical data in collaboration with chemists biologists clinicians within and outside of the company We develop algorithms and practice cuttingedge data engineering statistical analytics and machine learning techniques to derive biological discoveries and clinical insights with rigor We are looking for an experienced biological data scientist in statistical inference machine learning and interested in biology and healthcare to bring hisher skills to our team This is a great opportunity to tackle a diverse set of problems while shaping the future of life scienceppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliApply statistical and machine learning methods to genomics metabolomics microbiome and clinical dataliliCollaborate with scientists and clinicians to investigate scientific and medical problems with rigorous analyses and critical thinkingliliApply and develop machine learning methods to produce novel and highconfidence insights with dataliliCommunicate data insights with collaborators and clients with clarityliliPublicize research discoveries with presentations and publicationsliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliMS or PhD in statistics computational biology bioinformatics genetics physics or engineeringliliDeep knowledge and experience with statistical inference and machine learning on omics and clinical datasetliliTrack record of highquality projects or publicationsliliProficiency with statistical programming with R and pythonliliExperience with database query language eg SQL and cloud computing eg AWSliliRigorous statistical intuition and deep understanding of core statistical principlesliliCurious and eager to learn selfmotivated great communicator thriving in a dynamic and intellectually challenging environmentliliOrganized and driven critical thinkerliliExcellent oral and written communication skillsliul
